entry.title: Error: Unable to Unlink Old (Permission Denied)
entry.content:
Sometimes when we try to pull from remote repository we got this error:

error: unable to unlink old 'path/repo/file' (Permission denied)

The simple solution is by change the access of the file parent folder so your account have access to write into that folder. In linux we can use this command:

sudo chmod -R g+w path/repo

hope this can help fix your problem
